<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script">

        <description/>
        <execute_function>false</execute_function>
        <filter_condition table="x_431105_cand_ass_assessment">stateCHANGESTO30^EQ<item display_value="Assessment" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="30"/>
            <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/>
        </filter_condition>
        <is_rest>false</is_rest>
        <message/>
        <name>Start Assessment</name>
        <order>100</order>
        <priority>100</priority>
        <rest_method/>
        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    var CANDIDATE_TABLE = 'x_431105_cand_ass_candidate';
    //var SELECTION_CRITERIA_LIBRARY = 'x_431105_cand_ass_selection_criteria_library';
    var COMPETITION_SELECTION_CRITERIA = 'x_431105_cand_ass_assessment_selection_criteria';
    var CANDIDATE_SELECTION_CRITERIA_SCORE = 'x_431105_cand_ass_candidate_selection_criteria_score';
    var COMPETITION_STATE_ASSESSMENT = '59bde95b473ae110691e7258946d438f';
    var ELIGIBILITY_DONE = '70';
    var INVITATION_ASSESSMENT = '80';
    var OUT_OF_RESERVE_LIST = '130';

    //var grSelectionCriteriaLibrary = new GlideRecord(SELECTION_CRITERIA_LIBRARY);
    var grCompetitionSelectionCriteria = new GlideRecord(COMPETITION_SELECTION_CRITERIA);
    var grCandidate = new GlideRecord(CANDIDATE_TABLE);
    grCandidate.addQuery('assessment', current.sys_id);
    grCandidate.query();
    while (grCandidate.next()) {
        if (grCandidate.eligible == 'Yes') {
            grCandidate.state = INVITATION_ASSESSMENT;
        } else {
            grCandidate.state = OUT_OF_RESERVE_LIST;
        }
        grCandidate.update();
    }
    grCandidate.addQuery('assessment', current.sys_id);
    grCandidate.query();
    while (grCandidate.next()) {
        grCompetitionSelectionCriteria.addQuery('assessment', current.sys_id);
        grCompetitionSelectionCriteria.query();
        while (grCompetitionSelectionCriteria.next()) {
			var grCandidateSelectionCriteriaScore = new GlideRecord(CANDIDATE_SELECTION_CRITERIA_SCORE);
			grCandidateSelectionCriteriaScore.initialize();
            //gs.addInfoMessage('Candidate' + grCandidate.sys_id);
            //gs.addInfoMessage('Selection Criteria' + grCompetitionSelectionCriteria.sys_id);
            grCandidateSelectionCriteriaScore.candidate = grCandidate.sys_id;
            grCandidateSelectionCriteriaScore.assessment_selection_criteria = grCompetitionSelectionCriteria.sys_id;
            grCandidateSelectionCriteriaScore.max_value = grCompetitionSelectionCriteria.max_value;
            grCandidateSelectionCriteriaScore.update();
            //gs.addInfoMessage('Updated');
        }
    }




})(current, previous);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>nappoma</sys_created_by>
